ProteinName	Mitoferrin-2 (Mitochondrial RNA-splicing protein 3/4 homolog) (MRS3/4) (hMRS3/4) (Mitochondrial iron transporter 2) (Solute carrier family 25 member 28)
GeneName	SLC25A28 MFRN2 NPD016
Length	364
Function	Mitochondrial iron transporter that mediates iron uptake. Probably required for heme synthesis of hemoproteins and Fe-S cluster assembly in non-erythroid cells.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane; Mitochondrion inner membrane
